data.subTitle: 百度插件自动搜索
data.content:
在后台页中用js获取chrome的标签页,要在权限中加入tabs权限

chrome.tabs.getSelected(null,function(tab){
    var title = tab.title;
    //chrome.tabs.executeScript(null,{code:"javascript:alear('"+title+"')"});
    //百度插件自动搜索
    chrome.tabs.executeScript(null,{
        code: "var kw=document.querySelector('#kw');kw.value='关键字';var button=document.querySelector('#su');button.click();"
    })
})

功能升级，打开网站自动执行搜索

1.先要配置manifest.json文件

"content_scripts": [{
    "matches": ["https://www.baidu.com/*"],
    "js": ["js/content.js"],
    "run_at": "document_start"//文档打开时自动执行
}]

2. js/content.js

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded',function(){
    var weburl = window.location;
    if(weburl === 'https://www.baidu.com/'){
        var kw = document.querySelector('#kw');
        kw.value = '关键词';
        var button = document.querySelector('#su');
        button.click();
    }
});
